37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated through other chains of transmitters. The hadith of Ibn Mushir on the authority of 'Ubaidullah it is as:He who eats or drinks in the vessel of silver and gold, - but there is no mention in any one of the other chains of the words pertaining to eating and gold

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ أَوَانِي الذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ فِي الشُّرْبِ وَغَيْرِهِ عَلَى الرِّجَالِ وَالنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Using Vessels Of Gold And Silver For Drinking Etc., For Men And Women
